mapper.select: select * from company where UPPER(coname) like UPPER('%'||#{coname}||'%') or UPPER(coname) like UPPER('%''_'||#{coname}||'%')
select * from company where UPPER(coname) like UPPER('%'||#{coname}||'%')

select * from (company join hire on company.coname=hire.name) where (UPPER(coname) like UPPER('%'||#{coname}||'%') or UPPER(title) like UPPER('%'||#{title}||'%')) or UPPER(big) like UPPER('%'||#{big}||'%') or UPPER(small) like UPPER('%'||#{small}||'%') order by startdate desc
